room_title: Escape room "Uncle Ernie's Millions" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: My sister and her husband came to visit, we played 'Uncle Ernie's Millions' and had a great time! Dallas was our host and gave us some great clues, definitely a 5-star experience.

room_title: Escape room "Uncle Ernie's Millions" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: We simply loved Uncle Ernieâ€™s Millions! The staff was just amazing! They have several great rooms, plenty of parking, and great atmosphere. The rooms are well thought out and challenging. We will definitely be back as this is one of our favorite escape rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Uncle Ernie's Millions" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: We did this with friends and had a ball! Uncle Ernie's Millions was so much fun! When they tell you to look at everything believe them and communication between players is important. There were 4 in our group. We got so close to solving the challenge! Loads of fun and highly recommend trying it out!

room_title: Escape room "Uncle Ernie's Millions" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: Our group had a wonderful time and escaped with Uncle Ernie's millions with 9 seconds to spare!
